reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 3 Way Toggle Light Switch, 15 Amp, 120 V, Toggle Framed AC Quiet Switch, in Wall On/Off Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: The amount of pressure required to 'flip' the switch is excessive. If it takes 4 oz. of pressure to flip a normal "silent" light switch - these take about 2 lbs. This is a subjective description but it is very different from any modern era silent switch I've seen. The effort required is more in keeping with the switches of 40 years ago that made a pronounced "click" when you toggled them (maybe even more). I am one day over the return period or I would return them all. As is I am stuck with 10 switches that I will not use. If you don't care how much effort required to flip it, they are probably okay.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2025
reviews.title: Too much pressure/effort required to flip these switches

reviews.text: I have been using these three ways throughout my 1937 farmhouse you walk through multiple rooms to get to the next and I wanted to be able to turn on lights as you go. I have also used them for single pole switches as well and they work great. Before I install them I showed them to my electrician to get his opinion and he thought they were well made as well. Much more affordable than anything I could find in a big box store.

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 3 Way Toggle Light Switch, 15 Amp, 120 V, Toggle Framed AC Quiet Switch, in Wall On/Off Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: I wish to tell my best about the fast delivery, this is quiet disturbing i have to work during week to have my project finish and already have the parts ! :) As you know now, i am electrician, There is some yearly regulation broadcast to our members. First one tab of the screw mounting of the switch have a copper plate, this very important, it needs to be on the life circuit, we don't show instructions about that. Second, the ON/OFF imcription we can't see it easily, i know when you have to flip a switch you just try, but why you print a ON/OFF releif even though we can't see it, this is why i downgrade 1 star. Rest is perfect, nice product and will consider for reference !
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2021
reviews.title: Best for immediate replacement

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 3 Way Toggle Light Switch, 15 Amp, 120 V, Toggle Framed AC Quiet Switch, in Wall On/Off Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: I have the need to turn on the lights, going from up stairs or down the stairs. Or entering the kitchen from the back door, or from the livingroom. This is a great way to do it your self. The information on how to hook up a 3 way switch is on the internet. You just need no less than 14 Gage 4 wires, with Black, Red, White and a Ground bare wire. 2 outlet boxes and 2 3 way switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2021
reviews.title: Want to turn on a light as you enter a room that has 2 doors, this is the answer.

reviews.text: Had to go this route since all the hardware stores nearby were out of ten packs of three ways. Little thicker plastic around the switch which was a surprise but still managed to make them look good. They do have require a little more effort to flip then the Eaton switches I'm used to, but should loosen up as time goes I would assume. Overall good value and solid switches.
